attributes.action: get Kate Garroway out of Strictly Come Dancing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: She seems a lovely person but she really can't dance. It is not fair that talented people like Gabby Logan and Penny Lancaster Stewart are voted off but she remains in week after week. Please help to stop this terrible injustice!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
